title: S12 Ep70: The Unseen Hand: A New Exploration of Poltergeist Phenomena
itunes:title: The Unseen Hand: A New Exploration of Poltergeist Phenomena
description:
Rapping on the walls. Mysterious rains of stones. Furniture moving around by itself. Phantom voices. Unexplained fires. Invisible assaults. The symptoms of poltergeist activity are well known, but what is a poltergeist, really?

Jenny Ashford: http://www.jennyashford.com/
